name: Morlequariat Alpha V1
description:
MORLEQUARIAT: The Final Chronicle of the House of Plifk is an upcoming story-based Japanese-style RPG whose gameplay involves turn-based tactical combat, obscure puzzles hidden throughout the world, and a storyline detailing a band of heroes on a quest for the sacred relic known as the Morlequariat of Threm, which was stolen long ago by the treacherous Sir Regivold Plifk.

This is Alpha V1, a proof-of-concept showcasing the engine code (which is working, for the most part) and a prototype of the user interface. The combat system is fully operational, but will need some visual refinement.

More information about the game and its future can be found at morlequariat.mithrilnova.me. For real-time development updates, join the official discord.

Upcoming in Alpha V2:

  • Music
  • Spellcasting system
  • Level transitions

Game created in C++ using SFML. Music will be created with LMMS.
